title: Every time I open the loot page my client crashes.
body:
I don't know if this has been discussed before, but I can't go on my loot page (I noticed this because I get my lvl up reward, but now I can't open them at all). 
pls help?

replies.body:
Do me a favor and try running a quick client repair through the in-client settings. There might be some client files related to your loot that are damaged or missing causing these crashes when those files are called on. 

If that doesn't help, there's also a small chance this is connection related as well. Depending on how it happens, failing to pull your loot data from the servers could potentially cause the client to crash. Hit up this guide on [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover all your bases as well.
I'm from EUW and the same happens. Maybe tomorrow (06-12) 7.24 Riot fixes this bug :|{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
